name: Catch N Spin
description:
Spin your ⚽B A L L⚽ to catch more ⚽B A L L S⚽! But beware, if you don't catch the ⚽B A L L S⚽ correctly, the ⚽B A L L S⚽ will start to pile up until the ⚽B A L L P R E S S U R E⚽ kills you!

This project is in early access, I will go back through later and improve the game in many areas.

My third uploaded Unity project! :D

Created from a Youtube tutorial by: Blackthronprod
